oai_dc:dc.dc:title: HIClass : hyper-interactive text classification by interactive supervision of document and term labels
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: GODBOLE, S
HARPALE, A
SARAWAGI, S
CHAKRABARTI, S
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We present the HIClass (Hyper Interactive text Classification) system, an interactive text classification system which combines the cognitive power of humans with the power of automated learners to make statistically sound classification decisions. HIClass is based on active learning principles and has aids for detailed analysis and fine tuning of text classifiers while exerting a low cognitive load on the user.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: KNOWLEDGE DISCOVERY IN DATABASES: PKDD 2004, PROCEEDINGS,3202,546-548
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: 15th European Conference on Machine Learning/8th European Conference on Principles and Practice of Knowledge Discovery in Databases,Pisa, ITALY,SEP 20-24, 2004
